name: The never ending creatures
description:
Your home is in danger! You need to protect it fast!

Survive to waves of enemies with your punches!

CONTROLS:

right click = right puch

left click = left punch

W,A,S,D to move

UI (not really finished):

Top left = House remaining life

Top right = Waves counter

On top of your head you have your remaining lives

Each time a enemy touch you you return to the top of the map and have to go down fast to protect your house!
